title: Potato and Courgette Soup
ingredients: ['30g margarine', '2 onions, chopped', '2 potatoes, peeled and diced', '8 courgettes, chopped', '1/4 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/4 teaspoon dried rosemary', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon ground white pepper', '1 litre chicken stock', '250ml full fat milk', '4 tablespoons instant mash granules or flakes', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh dill']
